bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

checkable.description: If you can choose whether you want to, the type will not take effect after you use it
checkable.description_zh: 是否可以选择，使用后 type 将不生效

checked.description: Whether it is selected or not, and use it with checkable
checked.description_zh: 是否被选中，配合 checkable 一起使用

closable.description: Whether it can be turned off

color.description: Label color, 'type' is invalid when set
color.type: { color?: string, borderColor?: string, textColor?: string }
color.description_zh: 标签颜色，设置该项后 `type` 无效

round.description: Whether the corners are rounded or not

strong.description: Whether the text is in bold or not

trigger-click-on-close.description: Whether or not to trigger a click event when closed
trigger-click-on-close.description_zh: 关闭时是否触发点击事件

type.type: default / primary / info / success / warning / error

events.name: update:checked
events.description: Select a callback when the status changes
events.description_zh: 选择状态更改时的回调
